release_notes.en-US:
- email validation button (essentially for converting in lowercase) 
- fix for unsupported fields types in edition
- when nothing changed after a contact edition, nothing is saved
- merge dialog : support of contact events and 4.0 fields
- merge dialog : support of lists
- birthday title : support of card name
- possibility to go to next|previous contact in edition
- full support of message window
- pl translation completed (big thanks to SecretOfSteel)
- fix display column name for identities

release_notes.en-US:
- possibility to restrict fields in edition
- printing is now possible
- fix for restricting the email autocompletion search in preferences
- fix wrong email collection when an email account restriction is defined
- fix the contact sidebar account restriction
- fix for enabling and disabling CardBook
- fix for cards drag and drop in lists
- UI polished
- de translation improved (big thanks to Chris Mehl)
- cs translation improved (big thanks to Michal Blahout)
- fix for the correspondent columns
